stripped_text: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, you may trash this upgrade. If you do, choose 1 installed icebreaker that was used to break at least 1 subroutine during this run. The Runner adds that icebreaker to the bottom of the stack.
text: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, you may trash this upgrade. If you do, choose 1 installed icebreaker that was used to break at least 1 subroutine during this run. The Runner adds that icebreaker to the bottom of the stack.
title: Will-o'-the-Wisp
